27struct vec2
28{
29 union
30 {
31 struct
32 {
33 float x, y;
34 };
35 float v[2];
36 };
37
38 vec2() {}
39 vec2(float x, float y) : x(x), y(y) {}
40 explicit vec2(const vec &v);
41 explicit vec2(const vec4<float> &v);
42
43 float &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
44 float operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
45
46 bool operator==(const vec2 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y; }
47 bool operator!=(const vec2 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y; }
48
49 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0; }
50 float dot(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
51 float squaredlen() const { return dot(*this); }
52 float magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
53 vec2 &normalize() { mul(1/magnitude()); return *this; }
54 vec2 &safenormalize() { float m = magnitude(); if(m) mul(1/m); return *this; }
55 float cross(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.y - y*o.x; }
56 float squaredist(const vec2 &e) const { return vec2(*this).sub(e).squaredlen(); }
57 float dist(const vec2 &e) const { return sqrtf(squaredist(e)); }
58
59 vec2 &mul(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; return *this; }
60 vec2 &mul(const vec2 &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; return *this; }
61 vec2 &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
62 vec2 &div(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; return *this; }
63 vec2 &div(const vec2 &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; return *this; }
64 vec2 &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; return *this; }
65 vec2 &add(float f) { x += f; y += f; return *this; }
66 vec2 &add(const vec2 &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; return *this; }
67 vec2 &sub(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; return *this; }
68 vec2 &sub(const vec2 &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; return *this; }
69 vec2 &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; }
70 vec2 &min(const vec2 &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); return *this; }
71 vec2 &max(const vec2 &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); return *this; }
72 vec2 &min(float f) { x = ::min(x, f); y = ::min(y, f); return *this; }
73 vec2 &max(float f) { x = ::max(x, f); y = ::max(y, f); return *this; }
74 vec2 &abs() { x = fabs(x); y = fabs(y); return *this; }
75 vec2 &clamp(float l, float h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); return *this; }
76 vec2 &reflect(const vec2 &n) { float k = 2*dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; return *this; }
77 vec2 &lerp(const vec2 &b, float t) { x += (b.x-x)*t; y += (b.y-y)*t; return *this; }
78 vec2 &lerp(const vec2 &a, const vec2 &b, float t) { x = a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t; y = a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t; return *this; }
79 vec2 &avg(const vec2 &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
80
81 vec2 operator+(const vec2 &v2)
82 {
83 return vec2(x+v2.x, y+v2.y);
84 }
85
86 vec2 operator-(const vec2 &v2)
87 {
88 return vec2(x-v2.x, y-v2.y);
89 }
90
91 vec2 operator-()
92 {
93 return vec2(-x, -y);
94 }

98 {
99 return vec2(n*x, n*y);

103 {
104 return vec2(x*v2.x, y*v2.y);

108 vec2 operator/(const T &n)
109 {
110 return vec2(x/n, y/n);

115 return vec2(x/v2.x, y/v2.y);

119 vec2 &madd(const vec2 &a, const B &b) { return add(vec2(a).mul(b)); }
120
121 template<class B>
122 vec2 &msub(const vec2 &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec2(a).mul(b)); }
123
124 vec2 &rotate_around_z(float c, float s) { float rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
125 vec2 &rotate_around_z(float angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
126 vec2 &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
127};

129inline bool htcmp(const vec2 &x, const vec2 &y)
130{
131 return x == y;
132}
133
134inline uint hthash(const vec2 &k)
135{
136 union
137 {
138 uint i;
139 float f;
140 } x, y;
141 x.f = k.x;
142 y.f = k.y;
143 uint v = x.i^y.i;
144 return v + (v>>12);
145}

156struct vec
157{
158 union
159 {
160 struct
161 {
162 float x, y, z;
163 };
164 struct
165 {
166 float r, g, b;
167 };
168 float v[3];
169 };

171 vec() {}

173 explicit vec(float a) : x(a), y(a), z(a) {}
174 vec(float a, float b, float c) : x(a), y(b), z(c) {}
175 explicit vec(int v[3]) : x(v[0]), y(v[1]), z(v[2]) {}
176 explicit vec(const float *v) : x(v[0]), y(v[1]), z(v[2]) {}
177 explicit vec(const vec2 &v, float z = 0) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(z) {}

179 explicit vec(const ivec &v);

181
182 vec(float yaw, float pitch) : x(-std::sin(yaw)*cosf(pitch)), y(cosf(yaw)*cosf(pitch)), z(std::sin(pitch)) {}
183 vec &set(int i, float f) { v[i] = f; return *this; }

229 //unary operators
230 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
231 float squaredlen() const { return x*x + y*y + z*z; }
232 vec &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
233 vec &neg2() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; } //unused
234 vec &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; } //overloaded by operator-()
235 vec &abs() { x = fabs(x); y = fabs(y); z = fabs(z); return *this; }
236 vec &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; z = 1/z; return *this; } //used twice
237 float magnitude2() const { return sqrtf(dot2(*this)); }
238 float magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
239 vec &normalize() { div(magnitude()); return *this; }
240 vec &safenormalize() { float m = magnitude(); if(m) div(m); return *this; }
241 bool isnormalized() const { float m = squaredlen(); return (m>0.99f && m<1.01f); }
242
243 //elementwise float operators
244 vec &mul(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this; }
245 vec &mul2(float f) { x *= f; y *= f; return *this; } //unused
246 vec &div(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; z /= f; return *this; }
247 vec &div2(float f) { x /= f; y /= f; return *this; } //unused
248 vec &add(float f) { x += f; y += f; z += f; return *this; }
249 vec &add2(float f) { x += f; y += f; return *this; } //used once
250 vec &addz(float f) { z += f; return *this; } //unused
251 vec &sub(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; z -= f; return *this; }
252 vec &sub2(float f) { x -= f; y -= f; return *this; } //unused
253 vec &subz(float f) { z -= f; return *this; } //unused
254 vec &min(float f) { x = ::min(x, f); y = ::min(y, f); z = ::min(z, f); return *this; }
255 vec &max(float f) { x = ::max(x, f); y = ::max(y, f); z = ::max(z, f); return *this; }
256 vec &clamp(float l, float h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); return *this; }

258 //elementwise vector operators
259 vec &mul(const vec &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; return *this; }
260 vec &div(const vec &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; return *this; }
261 vec &add(const vec &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; return *this; }
262 vec &sub(const vec &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; return *this; }
263 vec &min(const vec &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); z = ::min(z, o.z); return *this; }
264 vec &max(const vec &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); z = ::max(z, o.z); return *this; }
265
266 //dot products
267 float dot2(const vec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
268 float dot2(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
269 float dot(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
270 float squaredot(const vec &o) const { float k = dot(o); return k*k; } //unused
271 float absdot(const vec &o) const { return fabs(x*o.x) + fabs(y*o.y) + fabs(z*o.z); } //used once
272 float zdot(const vec &o) const { return z*o.z; } //unused
273
274 //distances
275 float squaredist(const vec &e) const { return vec(*this).sub(e).squaredlen(); }
276 float dist(const vec &e) const { return sqrtf(squaredist(e)); }
277 float dist(const vec &e, vec &t) const { t = *this; t.sub(e); return t.magnitude(); }
278 float dist2(const vec &o) const { float dx = x-o.x, dy = y-o.y; return sqrtf(dx*dx + dy*dy); }
279
280 //cross products
281 template<class T>
282 bool reject(const T &o, float r) { return x>o.x+r || x<o.x-r || y>o.y+r || y<o.y-r; }
283
284 template<class A, class B>
285 vec &cross(const A &a, const B &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
286
287 vec &cross(const vec &o, const vec &a, const vec &b) { return cross(vec(a).sub(o), vec(b).sub(o)); }
288
292 float scalartriple(const vec &a, const vec &b) const { return x*(a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y) + y*(a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z) + z*(a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x); }
293 float zscalartriple(const vec &a, const vec &b) const { return z*(a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x); } //unused
294
295 //transformations
296 vec &reflectz(float rz) { z = 2*rz - z; return *this; }
297 vec &reflect(const vec &n) { float k = 2*dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; z -= k*n.z; return *this; }
298 vec &project(const vec &n) { float k = dot(n); x -= k*n.x; y -= k*n.y; z -= k*n.z; return *this; }
299 vec &projectxydir(const vec &n) { if(n.z) z = -(x*n.x/n.z + y*n.y/n.z); return *this; } //used once
300 vec &projectxy(const vec &n)
301 {
302 float m = squaredlen(), k = dot(n);
303 projectxydir(n);
304 rescale(sqrtf(::max(m - k*k, 0.0f)));
305 return *this;
306 } //used once
307 vec &projectxy(const vec &n, float threshold)
308 {
309 float m = squaredlen(), k = ::min(dot(n), threshold);
310 projectxydir(n);
311 rescale(sqrtf(::max(m - k*k, 0.0f)));
312 return *this;
313 } //used once
314 vec &lerp(const vec &b, float t) { x += (b.x-x)*t; y += (b.y-y)*t; z += (b.z-z)*t; return *this; }
315 vec &lerp(const vec &a, const vec &b, float t) { x = a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t; y = a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t; z = a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t; return *this; }
316 vec &avg(const vec &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
317
318 template<class B>
319 vec &madd(const vec &a, const B &b) { return add(vec(a).mul(b)); }
320
321 template<class B>
322 vec &msub(const vec &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec(a).mul(b)); }
323
324 vec &rescale(float k)
325 {
326 float mag = magnitude();
327 if(mag > 1e-6f) mul(k / mag);
328 return *this;
329 }
330
331 vec &rotate_around_z(float c, float s) { float rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
332 vec &rotate_around_x(float c, float s) { float ry = y, rz = z; y = c*ry-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*ry; return *this; }
333 vec &rotate_around_y(float c, float s) { float rx = x, rz = z; x = c*rx+s*rz; z = c*rz-s*rx; return *this; }
334
335 vec &rotate_around_z(float angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
336 vec &rotate_around_x(float angle) { return rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
337 vec &rotate_around_y(float angle) { return rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
338
339 vec &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
340 vec &rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
341 vec &rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
342
343 vec &rotate(float c, float s, const vec &d)
344 {
345 *this = vec(x*(d.x*d.x*(1-c)+c) + y*(d.x*d.y*(1-c)-d.z*s) + z*(d.x*d.z*(1-c)+d.y*s),
346 x*(d.y*d.x*(1-c)+d.z*s) + y*(d.y*d.y*(1-c)+c) + z*(d.y*d.z*(1-c)-d.x*s),
347 x*(d.x*d.z*(1-c)-d.y*s) + y*(d.y*d.z*(1-c)+d.x*s) + z*(d.z*d.z*(1-c)+c));
348 return *this;
349 }
350 vec &rotate(float angle, const vec &d) { return rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), d); }
351 vec &rotate(const vec2 &sc, const vec &d) { return rotate(sc.x, sc.y, d); }
352
353 void orthogonal(const vec &d)
354 {
355 *this = fabs(d.x) > fabs(d.z) ? vec(-d.y, d.x, 0) : vec(0, -d.z, d.y);
356 }
357
358 void orthonormalize(vec &s, vec &t) const
359 {
360 s.project(*this);
361 t.project(*this).project(s);
362 } //unused
363
364 template<class T>
365 bool insidebb(const T &bbmin, const T &bbmax) const
366 {
367 return x >= bbmin.x && x <= bbmax.x && y >= bbmin.y && y <= bbmax.y && z >= bbmin.z && z <= bbmax.z;
368 }
369
370 template<class T, class U>
371 bool insidebb(const T &bbmin, const T &bbmax, U margin) const
372 {
373 return x >= bbmin.x-margin && x <= bbmax.x+margin && y >= bbmin.y-margin && y <= bbmax.y+margin && z >= bbmin.z-margin && z <= bbmax.z+margin;
374 }
375
376 template<class T, class U>
377 bool insidebb(const T &o, U size) const
378 {
379 return x >= o.x && x <= o.x + size && y >= o.y && y <= o.y + size && z >= o.z && z <= o.z + size;
380 }
381
382 template<class T, class U>
383 bool insidebb(const T &o, U size, U margin) const
384 {
385 size += margin;
386 return x >= o.x-margin && x <= o.x + size && y >= o.y-margin && y <= o.y + size && z >= o.z-margin && z <= o.z + size;
387 }
388
389 template<class T>
390 float dist_to_bb(const T &min, const T &max) const
391 {
392 float sqrdist = 0;
393 for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
394 {
395 if (v[i] < min[i])
396 {
397 float delta = v[i]-min[i];
398 sqrdist += delta*delta;
399 }
400 else if(v[i] > max[i])
401 {
402 float delta = max[i]-v[i];
403 sqrdist += delta*delta;
404 }
405 }
406 return sqrtf(sqrdist);
407 }
408
409 template<class T, class S>
410 float dist_to_bb(const T &o, S size) const
411 {
412 return dist_to_bb(o, T(o).add(size));
413 }
414
415 template<class T>
416 float project_bb(const T &min, const T &max) const
417 {
418 return x*(x < 0 ? max.x : min.x) + y*(y < 0 ? max.y : min.y) + z*(z < 0 ? max.z : min.z);
419 }
420
421 static vec hexcolor(int color)
422 {
423 return vec(((color>>16)&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f), ((color>>8)&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f), (color&0xFF)*(1.0f/255.0f));
424 }
425
426 int tohexcolor() const
427 {
428 return (static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(r, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255)<<16) |
429 (static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(g, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255)<<8) |
430 static_cast<int>(::std::clamp(b, 0.0f, 1.0f)*255);
431 }
432};
433
434inline vec2::vec2(const vec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
435
436inline bool htcmp(const vec &x, const vec &y)
437{
438 return x == y;
439}
440
441inline uint hthash(const vec &k)
442{
443 union { uint i; float f; } x, y, z;
444 x.f = k.x;
445 y.f = k.y;
446 z.f = k.z;
447 uint v = x.i^y.i^z.i;
448 return v + (v>>12);
449}
450
451
455struct bvec
456{
457 union
458 {
459 struct
460 {
461 uchar x, y, z;
462 };
463 struct
464 {
465 uchar r, g, b;
466 };
467 uchar v[3];
468 };
469
470 bvec() {}
471 bvec(uchar x, uchar y, uchar z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
472 explicit bvec(const vec &v) : x(static_cast<uchar>((v.x+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))), y(static_cast<uchar>((v.y+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))), z(static_cast<uchar>((v.z+1)*(255.0f/2.0f))) {}
473 explicit bvec(const vec4<uchar> &v);
474
475 uchar &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
476 uchar operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
477
478 bool operator==(const bvec &v) const { return x==v.x && y==v.y && z==v.z; }
479 bool operator!=(const bvec &v) const { return x!=v.x || y!=v.y || z!=v.z; }
480
481 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
482
483 vec tonormal() const { return vec(x*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, y*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, z*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f); }
484
485 bvec &normalize()
486 {
487 vec n(x-127.5f, y-127.5f, z-127.5f);
488 float mag = 127.5f/n.magnitude();
489 x = static_cast<uchar>(n.x*mag+127.5f);
490 y = static_cast<uchar>(n.y*mag+127.5f);
491 z = static_cast<uchar>(n.z*mag+127.5f);
492 return *this;
493 }
494
495 void lerp(const bvec &a, const bvec &b, float t)
496 {
497 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t);
498 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t);
499 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t);
500 }
501
502 void lerp(const bvec &a, const bvec &b, int ka, int kb, int d)
503 {
504 x = static_cast<uchar>((a.x*ka + b.x*kb)/d);
505 y = static_cast<uchar>((a.y*ka + b.y*kb)/d);
506 z = static_cast<uchar>((a.z*ka + b.z*kb)/d);
507 }
508
509 void flip()
510 {
511 x ^= 0x80;
512 y ^= 0x80;
513 z ^= 0x80;
514 }
515
516 void scale(int k, int d)
517 {
518 x = static_cast<uchar>((x*k)/d);
519 y = static_cast<uchar>((y*k)/d);
520 z = static_cast<uchar>((z*k)/d);
521 }
522
523 bvec &shl(int n)
524 {
525 x <<= n;
526 y <<= n;
527 z <<= n;
528 return *this;
529 }
530 bvec &shr(int n)
531 {
532 x >>= n;
533 y >>= n;
534 z >>= n;
535 return *this;
536 }
537
538 static bvec fromcolor(const vec &v)
539 {
540 return bvec(static_cast<uchar>(v.x*255.0f), static_cast<uchar>(v.y*255.0f), static_cast<uchar>(v.z*255.0f));
541 }
542
543 vec tocolor() const
544 {
545 return vec(x*(1.0f/255.0f), y*(1.0f/255.0f), z*(1.0f/255.0f));
546 }
547
548 static bvec from565(ushort c)
549 {
550 return bvec((((c>>11)&0x1F)*527 + 15) >> 6, (((c>>5)&0x3F)*259 + 35) >> 6, ((c&0x1F)*527 + 15) >> 6);
551 }
552
553 static bvec hexcolor(int color)
554 {
555 return bvec((color>>16)&0xFF, (color>>8)&0xFF, color&0xFF);
556 }
557
558 int tohexcolor() const
559 {
560 return (static_cast<int>(r)<<16)|(static_cast<int>(g)<<8)|static_cast<int>(b);
561 }
562};
563
572template<typename T>
573struct vec4
574{
575 union
576 {
577 struct { T x, y, z, w; };
578 struct { T r, g, b, a; };
579 T v[4];
580 uint mask;
581 };
582
583 vec4() {}
584 explicit vec4(const vec &p, T w = 0) : x(p.x), y(p.y), z(p.z), w(w) {}
585 explicit vec4(const vec2 &p, T z = 0, T w = 0) : x(p.x), y(p.y), z(z), w(w) {}
586 vec4(T x, T y, T z, T w) : x(x), y(y), z(z), w(w) {}
587 vec4(bvec v, uchar c)
588 {
589 x = v.x;
590 y = v.y;
591 z = v.z;
592 w = c;
593 }
594 vec4(bvec v)
595 {
596 x = v.x;
597 y = v.y;
598 z = v.z;
599 w = 0;
600 }
601
602 explicit vec4(const T *v) : x(v[0]), y(v[1]), z(v[2]), w(v[3]) {}
603
604 template<class U>
605 operator vec4<U>()
606 {
607 return vec4<U>(static_cast<U>(this->x),
608 static_cast<U>(this->y),
609 static_cast<U>(this->z),
610 static_cast<U>(this->w));
611 }
612
613 T &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
614 T operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
615
616 bool operator==(const vec4 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y && z == o.z && w == o.w; }
617 bool operator!=(const vec4 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y || z != o.z || w != o.w; }
618
619 T dot3(const vec4 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
620 T dot3(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
621 T dot(const vec4 &o) const { return dot3(o) + w*o.w; }
622 T dot(const vec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z + w; }
623 T squaredlen() const { return dot(*this); }
624 T magnitude() const { return sqrtf(squaredlen()); }
625 T magnitude3() const { return sqrtf(dot3(*this)); }
626 vec4 &normalize() { mul(1/magnitude()); return *this; }
627 vec4 &safenormalize() { T m = magnitude(); if(m) mul(1/m); return *this; }
628
629 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, float t)
630 {
631 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x + (b.x-a.x)*t);
632 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y + (b.y-a.y)*t);
633 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z + (b.z-a.z)*t);
634 w = a.w;
635 }
636
637 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, int ka, int kb, int d)
638 {
639 x = static_cast<uchar>((a.x*ka + b.x*kb)/d);
640 y = static_cast<uchar>((a.y*ka + b.y*kb)/d);
641 z = static_cast<uchar>((a.z*ka + b.z*kb)/d);
642 w = a.w;
643 }
644
645 void lerp(const vec4<uchar> &a, const vec4<uchar> &b, const vec4<uchar> &c, float ta, float tb, float tc)
646 {
647 x = static_cast<uchar>(a.x*ta + b.x*tb + c.x*tc);
648 y = static_cast<uchar>(a.y*ta + b.y*tb + c.y*tc);
649 z = static_cast<uchar>(a.z*ta + b.z*tb + c.z*tc);
650 w = static_cast<uchar>(a.w*ta + b.w*tb + c.w*tc);
651 }
652
653 void flip() { mask ^= 0x80808080; }
654
655 vec4 &lerp(const vec4 &b, T t)
656 {
657 x += (b.x-x)*t;
658 y += (b.y-y)*t;
659 z += (b.z-z)*t;
660 w += (b.w-w)*t;
661 return *this;
662 }
663 vec4 &lerp(const vec4 &a, const vec4 &b, T t)
664 {
665 x = a.x+(b.x-a.x)*t;
666 y = a.y+(b.y-a.y)*t;
667 z = a.z+(b.z-a.z)*t;
668 w = a.w+(b.w-a.w)*t;
669 return *this;
670 }
671 vec4 &avg(const vec4 &b) { add(b); mul(0.5f); return *this; }
672
673 template<class B>
674 vec4 &madd(const vec4 &a, const B &b) { return add(vec4(a).mul(b)); }
675
676 template<class B>
677 vec4 &msub(const vec4 &a, const B &b) { return sub(vec4(a).mul(b)); }
678
689 vec4 &mul3(T f) { x *= f; y *= f; z *= f; return *this; }
690
701 vec4 &mul(T f) { mul3(f); w *= f; return *this; }
702
714 vec4 &mul(const vec4 &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; w *= o.w; return *this; }
715
727 vec4 &mul(const vec &o) { x *= o.x; y *= o.y; z *= o.z; return *this; }
728
737 vec4 &square() { mul(*this); return *this; }
738
750 vec4 &div3(T f) { x /= f; y /= f; z /= f; return *this; }
751
762 vec4 &div(T f) { div3(f); w /= f; return *this; }
763
774 vec4 &div(const vec4 &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; w /= o.w; return *this; }
775
786 vec4 &div(const vec &o) { x /= o.x; y /= o.y; z /= o.z; return *this; }
787
796 vec4 &recip() { x = 1/x; y = 1/y; z = 1/z; w = 1/w; return *this; }
797
808 vec4 &add(const vec4 &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; w += o.w; return *this; }
809
821 vec4 &add(const vec &o) { x += o.x; y += o.y; z += o.z; return *this; }
822
833 vec4 &add3(T f) { x += f; y += f; z += f; return *this; }
834 vec4 &add(T f) { add3(f); w += f; return *this; }
835 vec4 &addw(T f) { w += f; return *this; }
836 vec4 &sub(const vec4 &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; w -= o.w; return *this; }
837 vec4 &sub(const vec &o) { x -= o.x; y -= o.y; z -= o.z; return *this; }
838 vec4 &sub3(T f) { x -= f; y -= f; z -= f; return *this; }
839 vec4 &sub(T f) { sub3(f); w -= f; return *this; }
840 vec4 &subw(T f) { w -= f; return *this; }
841 vec4 &neg3() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; }
842 vec4 &neg() { neg3(); w = -w; return *this; }
843 vec4 &clamp(T l, T h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); w = ::std::clamp(w, l, h); return *this; }
844
845
846 vec4 operator+(const vec4 &v2)
847 {
848 return vec4(x+v2.x, y+v2.y, z+v2.z, w+v2.w);
849 }
850
851 vec4 operator-(const vec4 &v2)
852 {
853 return vec4(x-v2.x, y-v2.y, z-v2.z, w+v2.w);
854 }
855
856 vec4 operator-()
857 {
858 return vec4(-x, -y, -z, -w);
859 }
860
861 template<typename U>
862 vec4 operator*(const U &n)
863 {
864 return vec4(n*x, n*y, n*z, n*w);
865 }
866
867 vec4 operator*(const vec4 &v2)
868 {
869 return vec4(x*v2.x, y*v2.y, z*v2.z, w*v2.w);
870 }
871
872 template<typename U>
873 vec4 operator/(const U &n)
874 {
875 return vec4(x/n, y/n, z/n, w/n);
876 }
877
878 vec4 operator/(const vec4 &v2)
879 {
880 return vec4(x/v2.x, y/v2.y, z/v2.z, w/v2.w);
881 }
882
883
884 template<class A, class B>
885 vec4 &cross(const A &a, const B &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
886
887 vec4 &cross(const vec &o, const vec &a, const vec &b) { return cross(vec(a).sub(o), vec(b).sub(o)); }
888
889 void setxyz(const vec &v) { x = v.x; y = v.y; z = v.z; }
890
891 vec4 &rotate_around_z(T c, T s) { T rx = x, ry = y; x = c*rx-s*ry; y = c*ry+s*rx; return *this; }
892 vec4 &rotate_around_x(T c, T s) { T ry = y, rz = z; y = c*ry-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*ry; return *this; }
893 vec4 &rotate_around_y(T c, T s) { T rx = x, rz = z; x = c*rx-s*rz; z = c*rz+s*rx; return *this; }
894
895 vec4 &rotate_around_z(T angle) { return rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
896 vec4 &rotate_around_x(T angle) { return rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
897 vec4 &rotate_around_y(T angle) { return rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
898
899 vec4 &rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
900 vec4 &rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
901 vec4 &rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { return rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
902
903 vec tonormal() const { return vec(x*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, y*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f, z*(2.0f/255.0f)-1.0f); }
904
905};
906inline vec2::vec2(const vec4<float> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
907inline vec::vec(const vec4<float> &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
908
919struct matrix3
920{
921 vec a, b, c;
922
923 matrix3() {}
924 matrix3(const vec &a, const vec &b, const vec &c) : a(a), b(b), c(c) {}
925 explicit matrix3(float angle, const vec &axis) { rotate(angle, axis); }
926 explicit matrix3(const quat &q);
927
928 explicit matrix3(const matrix4x3 &m);
929 explicit matrix3(const matrix4 &m);
930
931 void mul(const matrix3 &m, const matrix3 &n)
932 {
933 a = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.x).madd(m.b, n.a.y).madd(m.c, n.a.z);
934 b = vec(m.a).mul(n.b.x).madd(m.b, n.b.y).madd(m.c, n.b.z);
935 c = vec(m.a).mul(n.c.x).madd(m.b, n.c.y).madd(m.c, n.c.z);
936 }
937 void mul(const matrix3 &n) { mul(matrix3(*this), n); }
938
939 void multranspose(const matrix3 &m, const matrix3 &n)
940 {
941 a = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.x).madd(m.b, n.b.x).madd(m.c, n.c.x);
942 b = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.y).madd(m.b, m.b.y).madd(m.c, n.c.y);
943 c = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.z).madd(m.b, n.b.z).madd(m.c, n.c.z);
944 }
945 void multranspose(const matrix3 &n) { multranspose(matrix3(*this), n); }
946
947 void transposemul(const matrix3 &m, const matrix3 &n)
948 {
949 a = vec(m.a.dot(n.a), m.b.dot(n.a), m.c.dot(n.a));
950 b = vec(m.a.dot(n.b), m.b.dot(n.b), m.c.dot(n.b));
951 c = vec(m.a.dot(n.c), m.b.dot(n.c), m.c.dot(n.c));
952 }
953 void transposemul(const matrix3 &n) { transposemul(matrix3(*this), n); }
954
955 void transpose()
956 {
957 swap(a.y, b.x); swap(a.z, c.x);
958 swap(b.z, c.y);
959 }
960
961 template<class M>
962 void transpose(const M &m)
963 {
964 a = vec(m.a.x, m.b.x, m.c.x);
965 b = vec(m.a.y, m.b.y, m.c.y);
966 c = vec(m.a.z, m.b.z, m.c.z);
967 }
968
969 void invert(const matrix3 &o)
970 {
971 vec unscale(1/o.a.squaredlen(), 1/o.b.squaredlen(), 1/o.c.squaredlen());
972 transpose(o);
973 a.mul(unscale);
974 b.mul(unscale);
975 c.mul(unscale);
976 }
977 void invert() { invert(matrix3(*this)); }
978
979 void normalize()
980 {
981 a.normalize();
982 b.normalize();
983 c.normalize();
984 }
985
986 void scale(float k)
987 {
988 a.mul(k);
989 b.mul(k);
990 c.mul(k);
991 }
992
993 void rotate(float angle, const vec &axis)
994 {
995 rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), axis);
996 }
997
998 void rotate(float ck, float sk, const vec &axis)
999 {
1000 a = vec(axis.x*axis.x*(1-ck)+ck, axis.x*axis.y*(1-ck)+axis.z*sk, axis.x*axis.z*(1-ck)-axis.y*sk);
1001 b = vec(axis.x*axis.y*(1-ck)-axis.z*sk, axis.y*axis.y*(1-ck)+ck, axis.y*axis.z*(1-ck)+axis.x*sk);
1002 c = vec(axis.x*axis.z*(1-ck)+axis.y*sk, axis.y*axis.z*(1-ck)-axis.x*sk, axis.z*axis.z*(1-ck)+ck);
1003 }
1004
1005 void setyaw(float ck, float sk)
1006 {
1007 a = vec(ck, sk, 0);
1008 b = vec(-sk, ck, 0);
1009 c = vec(0, 0, 1);
1010 }
1011
1012 void setyaw(float angle)
1013 {
1014 setyaw(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle));
1015 }
1016
1017 float trace() const { return a.x + b.y + c.z; }
1018
1019 bool calcangleaxis(float tr, float &angle, vec &axis, float threshold = 1e-16f) const
1020 {
1021 if(tr <= -1)
1022 {
1023 if(a.x >= b.y && a.x >= c.z)
1024 {
1025 float r = 1 + a.x - b.y - c.z;
1026 if(r <= threshold)
1027 {
1028 return false;
1029 }
1030 r = sqrtf(r);
1031 axis.x = 0.5f*r;
1032 axis.y = b.x/r;
1033 axis.z = c.x/r;
1034 }
1035 else if(b.y >= c.z)
1036 {
1037 float r = 1 + b.y - a.x - c.z;
1038 if(r <= threshold)
1039 {
1040 return false;
1041 }
1042 r = sqrtf(r);
1043 axis.y = 0.5f*r;
1044 axis.x = b.x/r;
1045 axis.z = c.y/r;
1046 }
1047 else
1048 {
1049 float r = 1 + b.y - a.x - c.z;
1050 if(r <= threshold)
1051 {
1052 return false;
1053 }
1054 r = sqrtf(r);
1055 axis.z = 0.5f*r;
1056 axis.x = c.x/r;
1057 axis.y = c.y/r;
1058 }
1059 angle = M_PI;
1060 }
1061 else if(tr >= 3)
1062 {
1063 axis = vec(0, 0, 1);
1064 angle = 0;
1065 }
1066 else
1067 {
1068 axis = vec(b.z - c.y, c.x - a.z, a.y - b.x);
1069 float r = axis.squaredlen();
1070 if(r <= threshold)
1071 {
1072 return false;
1073 }
1074 axis.mul(1/sqrtf(r));
1075 angle = acosf(0.5f*(tr - 1));
1076 }
1077 return true;
1078 }
1079
1080 bool calcangleaxis(float &angle, vec &axis, float threshold = 1e-16f) const { return calcangleaxis(trace(), angle, axis, threshold); }
1081
1082 vec transform(const vec &o) const
1083 {
1084 return vec(a).mul(o.x).madd(b, o.y).madd(c, o.z);
1085 }
1086 vec transposedtransform(const vec &o) const { return vec(a.dot(o), b.dot(o), c.dot(o)); }
1087 vec abstransform(const vec &o) const
1088 {
1089 return vec(a).mul(o.x).abs().add(vec(b).mul(o.y).abs()).add(vec(c).mul(o.z).abs());
1090 }
1091 vec abstransposedtransform(const vec &o) const
1092 {
1093 return vec(a.absdot(o), b.absdot(o), c.absdot(o));
1094 }
1095
1096 void identity()
1097 {
1098 a = vec(1, 0, 0);
1099 b = vec(0, 1, 0);
1100 c = vec(0, 0, 1);
1101 }
1102
1103 void rotate_around_x(float ck, float sk)
1104 {
1105 vec rb = vec(b).mul(ck).madd(c, sk),
1106 rc = vec(c).mul(ck).msub(b, sk);
1107 b = rb;
1108 c = rc;
1109 }
1110 void rotate_around_x(float angle) { rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1111 void rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
1112
1113 void rotate_around_y(float ck, float sk)
1114 {
1115 vec rc = vec(c).mul(ck).madd(a, sk),
1116 ra = vec(a).mul(ck).msub(c, sk);
1117 c = rc;
1118 a = ra;
1119 }
1120 void rotate_around_y(float angle) { rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1121 void rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
1122
1123 void rotate_around_z(float ck, float sk)
1124 {
1125 vec ra = vec(a).mul(ck).madd(b, sk),
1126 rb = vec(b).mul(ck).msub(a, sk);
1127 a = ra;
1128 b = rb;
1129 }
1130 void rotate_around_z(float angle) { rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1131 void rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
1132
1133 vec transform(const vec2 &o) { return vec(a).mul(o.x).madd(b, o.y); }
1134 vec transposedtransform(const vec2 &o) const { return vec(a.dot2(o), b.dot2(o), c.dot2(o)); }
1135
1136 vec rowx() const { return vec(a.x, b.x, c.x); }
1137 vec rowy() const { return vec(a.y, b.y, c.y); }
1138 vec rowz() const { return vec(a.z, b.z, c.z); }
1139};
1140
1151struct matrix4x3
1152{
1153 vec a, b, c, d;
1154
1155 matrix4x3() {}
1156 matrix4x3(const vec &a, const vec &b, const vec &c, const vec &d) : a(a), b(b), c(c), d(d) {}
1157 matrix4x3(const matrix3 &rot, const vec &trans) : a(rot.a), b(rot.b), c(rot.c), d(trans) {}
1158 matrix4x3(const dualquat &dq);
1159 explicit matrix4x3(const matrix4 &m);
1160
1161 void mul(float k)
1162 {
1163 a.mul(k);
1164 b.mul(k);
1165 c.mul(k);
1166 d.mul(k);
1167 }
1168
1169 void setscale(float x, float y, float z)
1170 {
1171 a.x = x;
1172 b.y = y;
1173 c.z = z;
1174 }
1175
1176 void setscale(const vec &v)
1177 {
1178 setscale(v.x, v.y, v.z);
1179 }
1180
1181 void setscale(float n)
1182 {
1183 setscale(n, n, n);
1184 }
1185
1186 void scale(float x, float y, float z)
1187 {
1188 a.mul(x);
1189 b.mul(y);
1190 c.mul(z);
1191 }
1192
1193 void scale(const vec &v)
1194 {
1195 scale(v.x, v.y, v.z);
1196 }
1197
1198 void scale(float n)
1199 {
1200 scale(n, n, n);
1201 }
1202
1203 void settranslation(const vec &p)
1204 {
1205 d = p;
1206 }
1207
1208 void settranslation(float x, float y, float z)
1209 {
1210 d = vec(x, y, z);
1211 }
1212
1213 void translate(const vec &p)
1214 {
1215 d.madd(a, p.x).madd(b, p.y).madd(c, p.z);
1216 }
1217
1218 void translate(float x, float y, float z)
1219 {
1220 translate(vec(x, y, z));
1221 }
1222
1223 void translate(const vec &p, float scale)
1224 {
1225 translate(vec(p).mul(scale)); }
1226
1227 void accumulate(const matrix4x3 &m, float k)
1228 {
1229 a.madd(m.a, k);
1230 b.madd(m.b, k);
1231 c.madd(m.c, k);
1232 d.madd(m.d, k);
1233 }
1234
1235 void normalize()
1236 {
1237 a.normalize();
1238 b.normalize();
1239 c.normalize();
1240 }
1241
1242 void lerp(const matrix4x3 &to, float t)
1243 {
1244 a.lerp(to.a, t);
1245 b.lerp(to.b, t);
1246 c.lerp(to.c, t);
1247 d.lerp(to.d, t);
1248 }
1249 void lerp(const matrix4x3 &from, const matrix4x3 &to, float t)
1250 {
1251 a.lerp(from.a, to.a, t);
1252 b.lerp(from.b, to.b, t);
1253 c.lerp(from.c, to.c, t);
1254 d.lerp(from.d, to.d, t);
1255 }
1256
1257 void identity()
1258 {
1259 a = vec(1, 0, 0);
1260 b = vec(0, 1, 0);
1261 c = vec(0, 0, 1);
1262 d = vec(0, 0, 0);
1263 }
1264
1265 void mul(const matrix4x3 &m, const matrix4x3 &n)
1266 {
1267 a = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.x).madd(m.b, n.a.y).madd(m.c, n.a.z);
1268 b = vec(m.a).mul(n.b.x).madd(m.b, n.b.y).madd(m.c, n.b.z);
1269 c = vec(m.a).mul(n.c.x).madd(m.b, n.c.y).madd(m.c, n.c.z);
1270 d = vec(m.d).madd(m.a, n.d.x).madd(m.b, n.d.y).madd(m.c, n.d.z);
1271 }
1272 void mul(const matrix4x3 &n) { mul(matrix4x3(*this), n); }
1273
1274 void mul(const matrix3 &m, const matrix4x3 &n)
1275 {
1276 a = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.x).madd(m.b, n.a.y).madd(m.c, n.a.z);
1277 b = vec(m.a).mul(n.b.x).madd(m.b, n.b.y).madd(m.c, n.b.z);
1278 c = vec(m.a).mul(n.c.x).madd(m.b, n.c.y).madd(m.c, n.c.z);
1279 d = vec(m.a).mul(n.d.x).madd(m.b, n.d.y).madd(m.c, n.d.z);
1280 }
1281
1282 void mul(const matrix3 &rot, const vec &trans, const matrix4x3 &n)
1283 {
1284 mul(rot, n);
1285 d.add(trans);
1286 }
1287
1288 void transpose()
1289 {
1290 d = vec(a.dot(d), b.dot(d), c.dot(d)).neg();
1291 swap(a.y, b.x); swap(a.z, c.x);
1292 swap(b.z, c.y);
1293 }
1294
1295 void transpose(const matrix4x3 &o)
1296 {
1297 a = vec(o.a.x, o.b.x, o.c.x);
1298 b = vec(o.a.y, o.b.y, o.c.y);
1299 c = vec(o.a.z, o.b.z, o.c.z);
1300 d = vec(o.a.dot(o.d), o.b.dot(o.d), o.c.dot(o.d)).neg();
1301 }
1302
1303 void transposemul(const matrix4x3 &m, const matrix4x3 &n)
1304 {
1305 vec t(m.a.dot(m.d), m.b.dot(m.d), m.c.dot(m.d));
1306 a = vec(m.a.dot(n.a), m.b.dot(n.a), m.c.dot(n.a));
1307 b = vec(m.a.dot(n.b), m.b.dot(n.b), m.c.dot(n.b));
1308 c = vec(m.a.dot(n.c), m.b.dot(n.c), m.c.dot(n.c));
1309 d = vec(m.a.dot(n.d), m.b.dot(n.d), m.c.dot(n.d)).sub(t);
1310 }
1311
1312 void multranspose(const matrix4x3 &m, const matrix4x3 &n)
1313 {
1314 vec t(n.a.dot(n.d), n.b.dot(n.d), n.c.dot(n.d));
1315 a = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.x).madd(m.b, n.b.x).madd(m.c, n.c.x);
1316 b = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.y).madd(m.b, m.b.y).madd(m.c, n.c.y);
1317 c = vec(m.a).mul(n.a.z).madd(m.b, n.b.z).madd(m.c, n.c.z);
1318 d = vec(m.d).msub(m.a, t.x).msub(m.b, t.y).msub(m.c, t.z);
1319 }
1320
1321 void invert(const matrix4x3 &o)
1322 {
1323 vec unscale(1/o.a.squaredlen(), 1/o.b.squaredlen(), 1/o.c.squaredlen());
1324 transpose(o);
1325 a.mul(unscale);
1326 b.mul(unscale);
1327 c.mul(unscale);
1328 d.mul(unscale);
1329 }
1330 void invert() { invert(matrix4x3(*this)); }
1331
1332 void rotate(float angle, const vec &d)
1333 {
1334 rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), d);
1335 }
1336
1337 void rotate(float ck, float sk, const vec &axis)
1338 {
1339 matrix3 m;
1340 m.rotate(ck, sk, axis);
1341 *this = matrix4x3(m, vec(0, 0, 0));
1342 }
1343
1344 void rotate_around_x(float ck, float sk)
1345 {
1346 vec rb = vec(b).mul(ck).madd(c, sk),
1347 rc = vec(c).mul(ck).msub(b, sk);
1348 b = rb;
1349 c = rc;
1350 }
1351 void rotate_around_x(float angle)
1352 {
1353 rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle));
1354 }
1355
1356 void rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc)
1357 {
1358 rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y);
1359 }
1360
1361 void rotate_around_y(float ck, float sk)
1362 {
1363 vec rc = vec(c).mul(ck).madd(a, sk),
1364 ra = vec(a).mul(ck).msub(c, sk);
1365 c = rc;
1366 a = ra;
1367 }
1368 void rotate_around_y(float angle)
1369 {
1370 rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle));
1371 }
1372
1373 void rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc)
1374 {
1375 rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y);
1376 }
1377
1378 void rotate_around_z(float ck, float sk)
1379 {
1380 vec ra = vec(a).mul(ck).madd(b, sk),
1381 rb = vec(b).mul(ck).msub(a, sk);
1382 a = ra;
1383 b = rb;
1384 }
1385 void rotate_around_z(float angle) { rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1386 void rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
1387
1388 vec transform(const vec &o) const { return vec(d).madd(a, o.x).madd(b, o.y).madd(c, o.z); }
1389 vec transposedtransform(const vec &o) const { vec p = vec(o).sub(d); return vec(a.dot(p), b.dot(p), c.dot(p)); }
1390 vec transformnormal(const vec &o) const { return vec(a).mul(o.x).madd(b, o.y).madd(c, o.z); }
1391 vec transposedtransformnormal(const vec &o) const { return vec(a.dot(o), b.dot(o), c.dot(o)); }
1392 vec transform(const vec2 &o) const { return vec(d).madd(a, o.x).madd(b, o.y); }
1393
1394 vec4<float> rowx() const { return vec4<float>(a.x, b.x, c.x, d.x); }
1395 vec4<float> rowy() const { return vec4<float>(a.y, b.y, c.y, d.y); }
1396 vec4<float> rowz() const { return vec4<float>(a.z, b.z, c.z, d.z); }
1397};
1398
1399/*
1400
1401The engine uses 3 different linear coordinate systems
1402which are oriented around each of the axis dimensions.
1403
1404So any point within the game can be defined by four coordinates: (d, x, y, z)
1405
1406d is the reference axis dimension
1407x is the coordinate of the ROW dimension
1408y is the coordinate of the COL dimension
1409z is the coordinate of the reference dimension (DEPTH)
1410
1411typically, if d is not used, then it is implicitly the Z dimension.
1412ie: d=z => x=x, y=y, z=z
1413
1414*/
1415
1416// DIM: X=0 Y=1 Z=2.
1417const int R[3] = {1, 2, 0};
1418const int C[3] = {2, 0, 1};
1419const int D[3] = {0, 1, 2};
1421struct ivec2;
1422
1423//integer vector3
1424struct ivec
1425{
1426 union
1427 {
1428 struct
1429 {
1430 int x, y, z;
1431 };
1432 struct
1433 {
1434 int r, g, b;
1435 };
1436 int v[3];
1437 };
1438
1439 ivec() {}
1440 explicit ivec(const vec &v) : x(static_cast<int>(v.x)), y(static_cast<int>(v.y)), z(static_cast<int>(v.z)) {}
1441 ivec(int a, int b, int c) : x(a), y(b), z(c) {}
1442 ivec(int d, int row, int col, int depth)
1443 {
1444 v[R[d]] = row;
1445 v[C[d]] = col;
1446 v[D[d]] = depth;
1447 }
1448 ivec(int i, const ivec &co, int size) : x(co.x+((i&1)>>0)*size), y(co.y+((i&2)>>1)*size), z(co.z +((i&4)>>2)*size) {}
1449 explicit ivec(const ivec2 &v, int z = 0);
1450 explicit ivec(const svec &v);
1451
1452 int &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1453 int operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1454
1455 //int idx(int i) { return v[i]; }
1456 bool operator==(const ivec &v) const { return x==v.x && y==v.y && z==v.z; }
1457 bool operator!=(const ivec &v) const { return x!=v.x || y!=v.y || z!=v.z; }
1458 ivec operator+(const ivec &v) const { return ivec(x+v.x, y+v.y, z+v.z); }
1459 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0 && z==0; }
1460 ivec &shl(int n) { x<<= n; y<<= n; z<<= n; return *this; }
1461 ivec &shr(int n) { x>>= n; y>>= n; z>>= n; return *this; }
1462 ivec &mul(int n) { x *= n; y *= n; z *= n; return *this; }
1463 ivec &div(int n) { x /= n; y /= n; z /= n; return *this; }
1464 ivec &add(int n) { x += n; y += n; z += n; return *this; }
1465 ivec &sub(int n) { x -= n; y -= n; z -= n; return *this; }
1466 ivec &mul(const ivec &v) { x *= v.x; y *= v.y; z *= v.z; return *this; }
1467 ivec &div(const ivec &v) { x /= v.x; y /= v.y; z /= v.z; return *this; }
1468 ivec &add(const ivec &v) { x += v.x; y += v.y; z += v.z; return *this; }
1469 ivec &sub(const ivec &v) { x -= v.x; y -= v.y; z -= v.z; return *this; }
1470 ivec &mask(int n) { x &= n; y &= n; z &= n; return *this; }
1471 ivec &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; z = -z; return *this; }
1472 ivec &min(const ivec &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); z = ::min(z, o.z); return *this; }
1473 ivec &max(const ivec &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); z = ::max(z, o.z); return *this; }
1474 ivec &min(int n) { x = ::min(x, n); y = ::min(y, n); z = ::min(z, n); return *this; }
1475 ivec &max(int n) { x = ::max(x, n); y = ::max(y, n); z = ::max(z, n); return *this; }
1476 ivec &abs() { x = ::abs(x); y = ::abs(y); z = ::abs(z); return *this; }
1477 ivec &clamp(int l, int h) { x = ::std::clamp(x, l, h); y = ::std::clamp(y, l, h); z = ::std::clamp(z, l, h); return *this; }
1478 ivec &cross(const ivec &a, const ivec &b) { x = a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y; y = a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z; z = a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x; return *this; }
1479 int dot(const ivec &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y + z*o.z; }
1480 float dist(const plane &p) const;
1481
1482 static inline ivec floor(const vec &o) { return ivec(static_cast<int>(::floor(o.x)), static_cast<int>(::floor(o.y)), static_cast<int>(::floor(o.z))); }
1483 static inline ivec ceil(const vec &o) { return ivec(static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.x)), static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.y)), static_cast<int>(::ceil(o.z))); }
1484};
1485
1486inline vec::vec(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
1487
1488inline bool htcmp(const ivec &x, const ivec &y)
1489{
1490 return x == y;
1491}
1492
1493inline uint hthash(const ivec &k)
1494{
1495 return k.x^k.y^k.z;
1496}
1497
1501struct ivec2
1502{
1503 union
1504 {
1505 struct { int x, y; };
1506 int v[2];
1507 };
1508
1509 ivec2() {}
1510 ivec2(int x, int y) : x(x), y(y) {}
1511 explicit ivec2(const vec2 &v) : x(static_cast<int>(v.x)), y(static_cast<int>(v.y)) {}
1512 explicit ivec2(const ivec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
1513
1514 int &operator[](int i) { return v[i]; }
1515 int operator[](int i) const { return v[i]; }
1516
1517 bool operator==(const ivec2 &o) const { return x == o.x && y == o.y; }
1518 bool operator!=(const ivec2 &o) const { return x != o.x || y != o.y; }
1519
1520 bool iszero() const { return x==0 && y==0; }
1521 ivec2 &shl(int n) { x<<= n; y<<= n; return *this; }
1522 ivec2 &shr(int n) { x>>= n; y>>= n; return *this; }
1523 ivec2 &mul(int n) { x *= n; y *= n; return *this; }
1524 ivec2 &div(int n) { x /= n; y /= n; return *this; }
1525 ivec2 &add(int n) { x += n; y += n; return *this; }
1526 ivec2 &sub(int n) { x -= n; y -= n; return *this; }
1527 ivec2 &mul(const ivec2 &v) { x *= v.x; y *= v.y; return *this; }
1528 ivec2 &div(const ivec2 &v) { x /= v.x; y /= v.y; return *this; }
1529 ivec2 &add(const ivec2 &v) { x += v.x; y += v.y; return *this; }
1530 ivec2 &sub(const ivec2 &v) { x -= v.x; y -= v.y; return *this; }
1531 ivec2 &mask(int n) { x &= n; y &= n; return *this; }
1532 ivec2 &neg() { x = -x; y = -y; return *this; }
1533 ivec2 &min(const ivec2 &o) { x = ::min(x, o.x); y = ::min(y, o.y); return *this; }
1534 ivec2 &max(const ivec2 &o) { x = ::max(x, o.x); y = ::max(y, o.y); return *this; }
1535 ivec2 &min(int n) { x = ::min(x, n); y = ::min(y, n); return *this; }
1536 ivec2 &max(int n) { x = ::max(x, n); y = ::max(y, n); return *this; }
1537 ivec2 &abs() { x = ::abs(x); y = ::abs(y); return *this; }
1538 int dot(const ivec2 &o) const { return x*o.x + y*o.y; }
1539 int cross(const ivec2 &o) const { return x*o.y - y*o.x; }
1540};
1541
1542inline ivec::ivec(const ivec2 &v, int z) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(z) {}
1543
1544inline bool htcmp(const ivec2 &x, const ivec2 &y)
1545{
1546 return x == y;
1547}
1548
1549inline uint hthash(const ivec2 &k)
1550{
1551 return k.x^k.y;
1552}

1564 short v[3];
1565 };

1568 svec(short x, short y, short z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}

1570

1573};
1574

1576inline ivec::ivec(const svec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
1577
1581struct matrix4
1582{
1583 vec4<float> a, b, c, d;
1584
1585 matrix4() {}
1586 matrix4(const float *m) : a(m), b(m+4), c(m+8), d(m+12) {}
1587 matrix4(const vec &a, const vec &b, const vec &c = vec(0, 0, 1))
1588 : a(a.x, b.x, c.x, 0), b(a.y, b.y, c.y, 0), c(a.z, b.z, c.z, 0), d(0, 0, 0, 1)
1589 {}
1590 matrix4(const vec4<float> &a, const vec4<float> &b, const vec4<float> &c, const vec4<float> &d = vec4<float>(0, 0, 0, 1))
1591 : a(a), b(b), c(c), d(d)
1592 {}
1593 matrix4(const matrix4x3 &m)
1594 : a(m.a, 0), b(m.b, 0), c(m.c, 0), d(m.d, 1)
1595 {}
1596 matrix4(const matrix3 &rot, const vec &trans)
1597 : a(rot.a, 0), b(rot.b, 0), c(rot.c, 0), d(trans, 1)
1598 {}
1599
1600 void mul(const matrix4 &x, const matrix3 &y)
1601 {
1602 a = vec4<float>(x.a).mul(y.a.x).madd(x.b, y.a.y).madd(x.c, y.a.z);
1603 b = vec4<float>(x.a).mul(y.b.x).madd(x.b, y.b.y).madd(x.c, y.b.z);
1604 c = vec4<float>(x.a).mul(y.c.x).madd(x.b, y.c.y).madd(x.c, y.c.z);
1605 d = x.d;
1606 }
1607 void mul(const matrix3 &y) { mul(matrix4(*this), y); }
1608
1609 template<class T>
1610 void mult(const matrix4 &x, const matrix4 &y)
1611 {
1612 a = T(x.a).mul(y.a.x).madd(x.b, y.a.y).madd(x.c, y.a.z).madd(x.d, y.a.w);
1613 b = T(x.a).mul(y.b.x).madd(x.b, y.b.y).madd(x.c, y.b.z).madd(x.d, y.b.w);
1614 c = T(x.a).mul(y.c.x).madd(x.b, y.c.y).madd(x.c, y.c.z).madd(x.d, y.c.w);
1615 d = T(x.a).mul(y.d.x).madd(x.b, y.d.y).madd(x.c, y.d.z).madd(x.d, y.d.w);
1616 }
1617
1618 void mul(const matrix4 &x, const matrix4 &y) { mult<vec4<float>>(x, y); }
1619 void mul(const matrix4 &y) { mult<vec4<float>>(matrix4(*this), y); }
1620
1621 void muld(const matrix4 &x, const matrix4 &y) { mult<vec4<float>>(x, y); }
1622 void muld(const matrix4 &y) { mult<vec4<float>>(matrix4(*this), y); }
1623
1624 void rotate_around_x(float ck, float sk)
1625 {
1626 vec4<float> rb = vec4<float>(b).mul(ck).madd(c, sk),
1627 rc = vec4<float>(c).mul(ck).msub(b, sk);
1628 b = rb;
1629 c = rc;
1630 }
1631 void rotate_around_x(float angle) { rotate_around_x(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1632 void rotate_around_x(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_x(sc.x, sc.y); }
1633
1634 void rotate_around_y(float ck, float sk)
1635 {
1636 vec4<float> rc = vec4<float>(c).mul(ck).madd(a, sk),
1637 ra = vec4<float>(a).mul(ck).msub(c, sk);
1638 c = rc;
1639 a = ra;
1640 }
1641 void rotate_around_y(float angle) { rotate_around_y(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1642 void rotate_around_y(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_y(sc.x, sc.y); }
1643
1644 void rotate_around_z(float ck, float sk)
1645 {
1646 vec4<float> ra = vec4<float>(a).mul(ck).madd(b, sk),
1647 rb = vec4<float>(b).mul(ck).msub(a, sk);
1648 a = ra;
1649 b = rb;
1650 }
1651 void rotate_around_z(float angle) { rotate_around_z(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle)); }
1652 void rotate_around_z(const vec2 &sc) { rotate_around_z(sc.x, sc.y); }
1653
1654 void rotate(float ck, float sk, const vec &axis)
1655 {
1656 matrix3 m;
1657 m.rotate(ck, sk, axis);
1658 mul(m);
1659 }
1660 void rotate(float angle, const vec &dir) { rotate(cosf(angle), std::sin(angle), dir); }
1661 void rotate(const vec2 &sc, const vec &dir) { rotate(sc.x, sc.y, dir); }
1662
1663 void identity()
1664 {
1665 a = vec4<float>(1, 0, 0, 0);
1666 b = vec4<float>(0, 1, 0, 0);
1667 c = vec4<float>(0, 0, 1, 0);
1668 d = vec4<float>(0, 0, 0, 1);
1669 }
1670
1671 void settranslation(const vec &v) { d.setxyz(v); }
1672 void settranslation(float x, float y, float z) { d.x = x; d.y = y; d.z = z; }
1673
1674 void translate(const vec &p) { d.madd(a, p.x).madd(b, p.y).madd(c, p.z); }
1675 void translate(float x, float y, float z) { translate(vec(x, y, z)); }
1676 void translate(const vec &p, float scale) { translate(vec(p).mul(scale)); }
1677
1678 void setscale(float x, float y, float z) { a.x = x; b.y = y; c.z = z; }
1679 void setscale(const vec &v) { setscale(v.x, v.y, v.z); }
1680 void setscale(float n) { setscale(n, n, n); }
1681
1682 void scale(float x, float y, float z)
1683 {
1684 a.mul(x);
1685 b.mul(y);
1686 c.mul(z);
1687 }
1688 void scale(const vec &v) { scale(v.x, v.y, v.z); }
1689 void scale(float n) { scale(n, n, n); }
1690
1691 void scalexy(float x, float y)
1692 {
1693 a.x *= x; a.y *= y;
1694 b.x *= x; b.y *= y;
1695 c.x *= x; c.y *= y;
1696 d.x *= x; d.y *= y;
1697 }
1698
1699 void scalez(float k)
1700 {
1701 a.z *= k;
1702 b.z *= k;
1703 c.z *= k;
1704 d.z *= k;
1705 }
1706
1707 void reflectz(float z)
1708 {
1709 d.add(vec4(c).mul(2*z));
1710 c.neg();
1711 }
1712
1713 void jitter(float x, float y)
1714 {
1715 a.x += x * a.w;
1716 a.y += y * a.w;
1717 b.x += x * b.w;
1718 b.y += y * b.w;
1719 c.x += x * c.w;
1720 c.y += y * c.w;
1721 d.x += x * d.w;
1722 d.y += y * d.w;
1723 }
1724
1725 void transpose()
1726 {
1727 swap(a.y, b.x); swap(a.z, c.x); swap(a.w, d.x);
1728 swap(b.z, c.y); swap(b.w, d.y);
1729 swap(c.w, d.z);
1730 }
1731
1732 void transpose(const matrix4 &m)
1733 {
1734 a = vec4<float>(m.a.x, m.b.x, m.c.x, m.d.x);
1735 b = vec4<float>(m.a.y, m.b.y, m.c.y, m.d.y);
1736 c = vec4<float>(m.a.z, m.b.z, m.c.z, m.d.z);
1737 d = vec4<float>(m.a.w, m.b.w, m.c.w, m.d.w);
1738 }
1739
1740 void frustum(float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float znear, float zfar)
1741 {
1742 float width = right - left,
1743 height = top - bottom,
1744 zrange = znear - zfar;
1745 a = vec4<float>(2*znear/width, 0, 0, 0);
1746 b = vec4<float>(0, 2*znear/height, 0, 0);
1747 c = vec4<float>((right + left)/width, (top + bottom)/height, (zfar + znear)/zrange, -1);
1748 d = vec4<float>(0, 0, 2*znear*zfar/zrange, 0);
1749 }
1750
1751 void perspective(float fovy, float aspect, float znear, float zfar)
1752 {
1753 float ydist = znear * std::tan(fovy/2*RAD),
1754 xdist = ydist * aspect;
1755 frustum(-xdist, xdist, -ydist, ydist, znear, zfar);
1756 }
1757
1758 void ortho(float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float znear, float zfar)
1759 {
1760 float width = right - left,
1761 height = top - bottom,
1762 zrange = znear - zfar;
1763 a = vec4<float>(2/width, 0, 0, 0);
1764 b = vec4<float>(0, 2/height, 0, 0);
1765 c = vec4<float>(0, 0, 2/zrange, 0);
1766 d = vec4<float>(-(right+left)/width, -(top+bottom)/height, (zfar+znear)/zrange, 1);
1767 }
1768
1769 void clip(const plane &p, const matrix4 &m);
1770
1771 void transform(const vec &in, vec &out) const
1772 {
1773 out = vec(a).mul(in.x).add(vec(b).mul(in.y)).add(vec(c).mul(in.z)).add(vec(d));
1774 }
1775
1776 void transform(const vec4<float> &in, vec &out) const
1777 {
1778 out = vec(a).mul(in.x).add(vec(b).mul(in.y)).add(vec(c).mul(in.z)).add(vec(d).mul(in.w));
1779 }
1780
1781 void transform(const vec &in, vec4<float> &out) const
1782 {
1783 out = vec4<float>(a).mul(in.x).madd(b, in.y).madd(c, in.z).add(d);
1784 }
1785
1786 void transform(const vec4<float> &in, vec4<float> &out) const
1787 {
1788 out = vec4<float>(a).mul(in.x).madd(b, in.y).madd(c, in.z).madd(d, in.w);
1789 }
1790
1791 template<class T, class U>
1792 T transform(const U &in) const
1793 {
1794 T v;
1795 transform(in, v);
1796 return v;
1797 }

1799 template<class T>
1800 vec perspectivetransform(const T &in) const
1801 {
1802 vec4<float> v;
1803 transform(in, v);
1804 return vec(v).div(v.w);
1805 }

1808 {
1809 out = vec(a).mul(in.x).add(vec(b).mul(in.y)).add(vec(c).mul(in.z));
1810 }
1811

1813 {
1814 out = vec4<float>(a).mul(in.x).madd(b, in.y).madd(c, in.z);

1825 void transposedtransform(const vec &in, vec &out) const
1826 {
1827 vec p = vec(in).sub(vec(d));
1828 out.x = a.dot3(p);
1829 out.y = b.dot3(p);
1830 out.z = c.dot3(p);
1831 }
1832
1833 void transposedtransformnormal(const vec &in, vec &out) const
1834 {
1835 out.x = a.dot3(in);
1836 out.y = b.dot3(in);
1837 out.z = c.dot3(in);
1838 }

1840 void transposedtransform(const plane &in, plane &out) const;
1841
1842 float getscale() const
1843 {
1844 return sqrtf(a.x*a.y + b.x*b.x + c.x*c.x);
1845 }
1846
1847 vec gettranslation() const
1848 {
1849 return vec(d);
1850 }
1851
1852 vec4<float> rowx() const { return vec4<float>(a.x, b.x, c.x, d.x); }
1853 vec4<float> rowy() const { return vec4<float>(a.y, b.y, c.y, d.y); }
1854 vec4<float> rowz() const { return vec4<float>(a.z, b.z, c.z, d.z); }
1855 vec4<float> roww() const { return vec4<float>(a.w, b.w, c.w, d.w); }

1857 bool invert(const matrix4 &m, double mindet = 1.0e-12);
1858
1859 vec2 lineardepthscale() const
1860 {
1861 return vec2(d.w, -d.z).div(c.z*d.w - d.z*c.w);
1862 }
1863};

1875//generic two dimensional vector
1876template<class T>
1877struct GenericVec2
1878{
1879 T x,y;
1880
1881 GenericVec2() {}
1882 GenericVec2(T x, T y) : x(x), y(y) {}
1883 GenericVec2(const vec2 &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {}
1884
1885 bool operator==(const GenericVec2 &h) const { return x == h.x && y == h.y; }
1886 bool operator!=(const GenericVec2 &h) const { return x != h.x || y != h.y; }
1887};
1888
1889//generic three dmensional vector
1890template<class T>
1891struct GenericVec3
1892{
1893 T x,y,z;
1894
1895 GenericVec3() {}
1896 GenericVec3(T x, T y, T z) : x(x), y(y), z(z) {}
1897 GenericVec3(const vec &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y), z(v.z) {}
1898
1899 GenericVec3<T> operator+(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return GenericVec3<T>(x+h.x, y+h.y,z+h.z); }
1900 GenericVec3<T> operator-(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return GenericVec3<T>(x-h.x, y-h.y, z-h.z); }
1901
1902 //comparison
1903 bool operator==(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x == h.x && y == h.y && z == h.z; }
1904 bool operator!=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x != h.x || y != h.y || z != h.z; }
1905 bool operator>(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x > h.x && y > h.y && z > h.z; }
1906 bool operator<(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x < h.x && y < h.y && z < h.z; }
1907 bool operator>=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x >= h.x && y >= h.y && z >= h.z; }
1908 bool operator<=(const GenericVec3<T> &h) const { return x <= h.x && y <= h.y && z <= h.z; }
1909};

1916extern const vec2 sincos360[];
1917inline int mod360(int angle)
1918{
1919 if(angle < 0)
1920 {
1921 angle = 360 + (angle <= -360 ? angle%360 : angle);
1922 }
1923 else if(angle >= 360)
1924 {
1925 angle %= 360;
1926 }
1927 return angle;
1928}
1929inline const vec2 &sincosmod360(int angle) { return sincos360[mod360(angle)]; }
1930inline float cos360(int angle) { return sincos360[angle].x; }
1931inline float sin360(int angle) { return sincos360[angle].y; }
1932inline float tan360(int angle) { const vec2 &sc = sincos360[angle]; return sc.y/sc.x; }
1933inline float cotan360(int angle) { const vec2 &sc = sincos360[angle]; return sc.x/sc.y; }
